column4: Guys as you said I used sudo tasksel install lamp-server and got lamp installed
it is easy to install ~ web based wizard

it only include (Linux) Apache Mysql PHP
there is info on phpmyAdmin homepage

I think LAMP comes with mysql-server only
server is the database server XD ~ client is the cli for accessing the server ~ like phpmyadmin but in terminal
ok so you mean i dont need the client??
client also got the tools for backup databases ~ so i recommend kepping it
